scripts.mysql:start: sh -c "mysqladmin ping -h 127.0.0.1 -u bookfind -pbookfind --silent || (sudo mkdir -p /var/run/mysqld && sudo chown mysql:mysql /var/run/mysqld && sudo mysqld --user=mysql --daemonize --skip-networking=0 --bind-address=0.0.0.0)"
scripts.mysql:dev: sh -c "npm run mysql:start >/dev/null && while true; do sleep 3600; done"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n DB,PHP,BS -c auto "npm run mysql:dev" "npm run php:serve" "wait-on tcp:8000 && browser-sync start --proxy http://0.0.0.0:8000 --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000 --files \"assets/**/*.css,**/*.php,includes/**/*.php,actions/**/*.php\" --no-open --no-notify"
